subject: Rugby (Game)
Women and Girls
lead_paragraph: For the first time this weekend, women's teams will compete in an International Rugby Board-sanctioned event in rugby sevens as the sport tries to build itself up before making its Olympic debut in 2016.
snippet: For the first time this weekend, women's teams will compete in an International Rugby Board-sanctioned event in rugby sevens as the sport tries to build itself up before making its Olympic debut in 2016.
